pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Collection of Proteome Panels and Meta-Data // It aggregates protein panel data and metadata for protein quantitative trait locus (pQTL) analysis using 'pQTLtools' (https://jinghuazhao.github.io/pQTLtools/). The package includes data from affinity-based panels such as 'Olink' (https://olink.com/) and 'SomaScan' (https://somalogic.com/), as well as mass spectrometry-based panels from 'CellCarta' (https://cellcarta.com/) and 'Seer' (https://seer.bio/). The metadata encompasses updated annotations and publication details.
